text: Sergio Raúl Navarro Rodríguez (born February 20, 1936 in Santiago, Chile) is a Chilean former footballer. ==Career== He has played for Universidad de Chile (1955-1964), Colo-Colo (1965-1967) and Unión Española (1967-1968), and appeared for the Chile national football team in the 1962 FIFA World Cup, held in Chile. ==Honours== Universidad de Chile *Primera División: 1959, 1962, 1964 ==External links== * Profile at FIFA.com Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean footballers Category:Chile international footballers Category:Universidad de Chile footballers Category:Unión Española footballers Category:Colo-Colo footballers Category:Chilean football managers Category:Colo-Colo managers Category:1962 FIFA World Cup players Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Sergio Navarro
